header.title: The Threat to Privacy and Democracy in the Technological Age

title: The Threat to Privacy and Democracy in the Technological Age
content: Interview with Robert Scheer,  leading journalist, editor of the on-line news site, Truth Dig, and the author of They... <!--more--> Know Everything About You: How Data-Collecting Corporations and Snooping Government Agencies Are Destroying Democracy
